errors.name: EarlyPayPeriodError
errors.msg: Pay date must be greater than the 'next_pay_date' current unix timestamp.

errors.name: ZeroPaymentsRemaining
errors.msg: Contract has no remaining payments to be made. Payment could not be processed.

errors.name: UnknownNextPayDate
errors.msg: Next pay period not specified in escrow account. Payment could not be processed.

errors.name: UnknownLastPayDate
errors.msg: Last pay date not specified in escrow account. Payment could not be processed

errors.name: InvalidState
errors.msg: Invalid state. You are trying to execute a function ahead of current state.

errors.name: WrongDappWallet
errors.msg: Wrong DaPP Wallet. You provided the wrong DaPP wallet address.

errors.name: UnknownUserNotInitializer
errors.msg: Unknown user referenced as initializer.

errors.name: UnknownUserNotTaker
errors.msg: Unknown user referenced as taker.

errors.name: TokenAccountNotOwnedByInitializer
errors.msg: Specified token account not owned by Initializer.

errors.name: TokenAccountNotOwnedByTaker
errors.msg: Specified token account not owned by Taker.

errors.name: TokenAccountNotOwnedByPDA
errors.msg: Specified token account not owned by PDA.

errors.name: TokenAccountMismatchEscrow
errors.msg: Provided token account does not match account in escrow.

errors.name: InsufficientFundsInitializerTokenAccount
errors.msg: Initial Deposit Token Account has less funds than specified escrow amount. Amount within token account must match initial escrow amount.

errors.name: OverlyFundedInitializerTokenAccount
errors.msg: Initial Deposit Token Account has more funds than specified escrow amount. Amount within token account must match initial escrow amount.

errors.name: UnfundedInitializerTokenAccount
errors.msg: Initial Deposit Token Account has zero funds. Amount within token account must match initial escrow amount.

errors.name: InitializerIdenticalToTaker
errors.msg: Illegal initialization. Initializer and taker cannot be identical.

errors.name: RemainingFundsLessThanPayment
errors.msg: Unanticipated error: Funds in escrow are less than payment amount

errors.name: MismatchTokenProgramPubkey
errors.msg: Pubkey to token program does not match.

errors.name: InvalidContractLength
errors.msg: Contract length must be non-negative

errors.name: NegativeNumberOfPayments
errors.msg: Number of payments must be positive

errors.name: InsufficientNumberOfPayments
errors.msg: Number of payments must exceed number of Tokens to send

errors.name: NegativeFeeCalculatedError
errors.msg: Negative Fee Calculated. Calculated negative fee on Pay
